introduction: The following passage is adapted from Revolutionary Cuisine by Oliver Hutch (2022).
text: Blending traditional techniques with modern flavors, Chef Morita transforms staple ingredients. Her new menu, which ______ everything from locally sourced grains to exotic spices, has garnered praise from critics worldwide.
question: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English? Focus on matching the subject with its corresponding verb form in a nonrestrictive clause.
explanation: Choice A is correct because menu is a singular subject that takes the singular verb includes. B include is plural. C to include creates a fragment without a main verb. D is including uses present progressive inappropriately, suggesting an ongoing process rather than a general statement.
